Articles.Content:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/u9UsmAq.png[/img]

Yep, it's the Spad, Sandy, etc., ready to go put on a show... or to put some ordinance on target. Your call!

Requires the following mods and parts packs:
[url=http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/79542-1-0-5-SXT-Lack-s-Stock-Extension-SXT-23-1-12NOV15-KSC-v3?highlight=Stock+eXTension]SXT - Stock eXTension[/url]
[url=http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/99660-0-25-Adjustable-Landing-Gear]Adjustable Landing Gear[/url]
[url=http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/80234]Tweakscale[/url]
[url=http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/64711]Tweakable Everything[/url]

[url=http://kerbalx.com/MaverickSawyer/AD-Skyraider]Download here![/url]
Nice and simple design, I like it, It looks pretty close to the real thing! Well done!
